name: Hero Shuugou!! Pinball Party
summary: Hero Shuugou!! Pinball Party is a pinball game released for the Nintendo Game Boy. The player control the plunger and flippers from a pinball machine to handle the ball and aim for the highest score. There are two main modes, one featured in a 3-tier simple table and another featured in a more complex 3-tier table with different substages.
